definition: Kaiyuan county level city in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: South Kaiyuan hole located at the Kaiyuan city south under approximately 10 kilometers high mountain ridges.
sentences.chinese: 開遠南洞位於開遠市南約10公里的崇山峻嶺之下。

sentences.english: The present situation of odor pollution in Kaiyuan is introduced, and the countermeasures are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了開遠市惡臭污染現狀，提出了防治對策。
